LET'S BOUNCE

This is one of my old tracks and isn't available on my YouTube Channel but in SoundCloud. I tried to do my best 1 year ago when I was a beginner in music production back in june 2021. This track helped me to create "Impulse" in the future. Serving as a inspiration because of the style and the sound design.
